title: UXPH Webinar: Utilizing UX to Build Better IT Solutions
description: August 27, 2021 - In celebration of MCL-ACM’s 3rd Founding Anniversary and as part of the ‘CCIS Technology Seminar Series’, MCL-ACM held a webinar in partnership with UXPH. Mr. Jordan Aiko P. Deja, the resource speaker, talked about what User Experience is and how to create a better experience for the users. It was attended by students from MCL and other schools.
summary: In celebration of MCL-ACM’s 3rd Founding Anniversary and as part of the ‘CCIS Technology Seminar Series’, MCL-ACM held a webinar in partnership with UXPH.
